QuestData.Title: Free Spirits
QuestData.Description: I came upon one of the Shao-Tien Soul-Render's daggers. It radiates a strong magic. I've been told it should allow you to enter their spirit vortexes.$B$BThe mogu use these to harvest spirits and bind them to their will, but I'm hoping you can use it to free the spirits.$B$BEnter any of the spirit vortexes you can find up on the Golden Stair, and free all the captive spirits you find.
QuestData.LogDescription: Enter Spirit Vortexes and free 15 pandaren spirits inside.
